title: Wild Robot
plot: An animated adventure about a robot stranded on an island.

title: Chennai Express
plot: A man travels to Tamil Nadu to immerse his grandfather's ashes.

title: It ends with us
plot: A woman's relationship becomes complicated when her first love returns.

title: Moana
plot: A spirited teenager sails out on a daring mission to save her people.

title: Cars
plot: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs.

title: Garfield
plot: A lazy cat must save his owner and a dog from a kidnapping scheme.

title: Stranger Things
plot: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces.

title: Never Have I Ever
plot: A coming-of-age comedy-drama about an Indian-American teenager navigating high school.

title: Ginny & Georgia
plot: A mother and daughter duo navigate life together in a small New England town.

title: Queen of Tears
plot: A romantic drama about a married couple facing a crisis.

title: The Crown
plot: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign.

title: The Office
plot: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers in Scranton, PA.
